import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' function Add_Services() { const [formvalue, setformvalue] = useState({ id: "", name: "", desc: "", price: "" }) const getform =()=>{ setformvalue({...formvalue,id:new Date().getTime().toString(),[e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const submithandel = async (e) => { e.preventdefault();//Stop refresh the page const res = await axios.post(`http://localhost:3000/services`, formvalue) } return ( <>

) } export default Add_Services
